lead_paragraph: As the full toss left Andre Russell's blade and settled deep into the stands, dropping a deathly silence across the Wankhede Stadium, Virat Kohli stood dazed, gazing at the trajectory of the ball and perhaps wondering what else he could have done.

headline.print_headline: Let Down by Team Mates, Kohli's Golden World T20 Run Ends
headline.main: Let Down by Team Mates, Kohli's Golden World T20 Run Ends

snippet: As the full toss left Andre Russell's blade and settled deep into the stands, dropping a deathly silence across the Wankhede Stadium, Virat Kohli stood dazed, gazing at the trajectory of the ball and perhaps wondering what else he could have done....
